item.title: The Power of Variable Names
The Basic Requirements of a Game
item.description: Why is a game said to be a game? The answer is because it fulfills the key qualities of a game. There are at least 10 important quality keys in a game, according to Jesse Schell in his book The Art of Game Design. Games are played voluntarily (volunteer) There is no compulsion in playing a game. This means that the player has the control to freely join the game and leave the game.
